amendment.description: Amendment redirects $500,000 in funding within the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) of $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bordallo amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Bordallo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bordallo amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
